title: 21st Annual Key West Songwriter's Festival - May 7
seo_title: 21st Annual Key West Songwriter's Festival - May 7
seo_description:
Enjoy free live Songwriter's Music, cold drinks, warm sun and a dip in the pool. This year's line up is great!
12pm: Ashley Gearing, Kalie Shorr & Mikey Reaves
1pm: Lexi Tucker, Michael Hardy & Karleen Watt
2pm: Schmarx & Savvy
short_description: 21st Annual Key West Songwriter's Festival - May 7, 2016
